def calculate_weird_distance(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A, B) = case
        weird_distance = 1
        a_total = 0
        b_total = 0
        for i in range(N):
            if A[i] == B[i] and a_total == b_total:
                weird_distance += A[i]
            a_total += A[i]
            b_total += B[i]
        results.append(weird_distance)
    return results

def calculate_weird_distance(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A, B) = case
        weird_distance = 0
        a_total = 0
        b_total = 0
        for i in range(N):
            if A[i] != B[i] and a_total == b_total:
                weird_distance += A[i]
            a_total += A[i]
            b_total += B[i]
        results.append(weird_distance)
    return results

mutants.code:
def calculate_weird_distance(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A, B) = case
        weird_distance = 0
        a_total = 0
        b_total = 0
        for i in range(N):
            if A[i] == B[i] and a_total != b_total:
                weird_distance += A[i]
            a_total += A[i]
            b_total += B[i]
        results.append(weird_distance)
    return results
